alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:17PM CDT until July 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in east central Missouri... Northern Washington County in east central Missouri... Southwestern Franklin County in east central Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Parkway to near Bourbon to 9 miles south of Bland, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sullivan, St. Clair, Cuba, Steelville, Bourbon, Anthonies Mill, Parkway, Leasburg, Miramiguoa Park, Richwoods, St. Cloud, Japan, Stanton, Oak Hill, Piney Park, and Rosati. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 203 and 240. This also includes Onondaga Cave State Park and Meramec State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
